"""
        Run the program to test and validate its outputs.
        """
command = self._build_command_line(str(out_run_dir), **kwargs)
print(command)
exe = subprocess.Popen(command, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
out, err = exe.communicate()
print(out.decode('utf-8'))
print(err.decode('utf-8'))
assert exe.returncode == 0, 'Program exited with a {} code.'.format(exe.
    returncode)
self._validate_output(str(out_run_dir), reference, **kwargs)
